```{r}
tab <- tab %>% 
  mutate(level = map_chr(level, ~strsplit(., "")[[1]][1])) %>% 
  select(name, ID, level, precentage) %>%
  mutate(sample = "test")
```

```{r}
taxa.lvls <- c("U","R","D", "K", "P", "C", "O", "F", "G", "S")
```


```{r}
tab 
```



```{r}
out <- list()
for(l in taxa.lvls){
  t <- tab %>% filter(level == !!l)
  if(nrow(t) == 0){
    out[[l]] <- NULL
  }else{
    out[[l]] <- t %>% select(name, precentage)
  }
}
```
